name: Roll a Roball
description:
Our take on Unity's Roll-a-Ball tutorial for Tutorial Jam!  There was a lot more we wanted to do, but we both had to work all weekend so time was a big issue for us.  Still, it was a fun learning experience!

Just a warning, this game is kinda hard if you actually want to finish it.

The music was created by noot1 over on Soundcloud! Be sure to check them out! https://soundcloud.com/noot1
